description:
Many organisations now expect their current, and future, Project Managers to have a project management certification and also to be able to apply the knowledge that they have learnt through that certification process.

Project Managers are also benefiting from the certification process. In a recent survey, over 42% of respondents said that an IT certification helped them achieve the next job, get promoted or get more money.

The most recognised Project Management certification is the PMI's Project Management Professional (or PMP) certification. However, this exam is not easy and you cannot pass it without the required amount of preparation. Your own experience alone will not get you through.

Learn, prepare and master the concepts and techniques of contained within the PMI Body of Knowledge to prepare you for the PMP exam.

Contents and Overview

The course covers the first two chapters of the PMBOK v5 and contains the following video lectures:

Chapter 1: Introduction

  • Introduction and Objectives
  • What is a Project
  • What is Project Management
  • Organizational Project Management
  • Projects and the Organization
  • The Role of the Project Manager
  • Chapter Summary
  • Final Exam

Chapter 2: Organisational Influences and Project Life Cycle

  • Introduction and Objectives
  • Organisational Structure
  • Project Stakeholders
  • Project Governance
  • Project Lifecycle
  • Chapter Summary
  • Final Exam

Each Final Exam  contains replica PMP questions which cover the corresponding chapter of the PMBOK.

This course will take you around two hours to cover the materials sufficiently.

Please note that this course has been narrated by a professional voice-over artist.

All PMBOK content and references are copyright of the PMI.
title: Pass the PMP Certification exam (PMBOK Chapter 1 & 2)
